name: Swift Space
description:
This game is an endless top down shooter set in space. Avoid collisions and defeat the enemies to set your Highscore and compete with your friends! 

The game is still WiP, we will try to update it as soon as new features make it in and are fully tested. Since we are only a small student team, we are still in the process of learning and optimizing our game. Any feedback is welcome.
